CustomField.inlineHelpText: Assess the response to toys including tennis balls, squeaky toy, plush toy, tug or rope toy. Note preference and whether they will drop or exchange for other toys or food. Note resource guarding or excitability.
CustomField.label: Play With Toys

value.fullName: Playful: engages, has self-control, may exchange, or offer toy
value.label: Playful: engages, has self-control, may exchange, or offer toy

value.fullName: Avoidant/hoards: reluctant to approach or takes toys and retreats
value.label: Avoidant/hoards: reluctant to approach or takes toys and retreats

value.fullName: Over stimulated : high arousal, may fixate, jump up, snatch toys, unable to distract
value.label: Over stimulated : high arousal, may fixate, jump up, snatch toys, unable to distract

value.fullName: Confrontational: may take once and then show escalating frustration towards handler
value.label: Confrontational: may take once and then show escalating frustration towards handler
